text_block_list.text:
There once was a little witch 
who lived quietly, deep in the mountains.

But, she did not know what to use her magic for. 
"What is the purpose of my powers?" she wondered.

One night, under the dim moonlight, 
she read a picture book about the outside world.

The picture book showed people living happily 
in the outside world.
"How nice. I wish I there with them."

The little witch was moved and started to 
admire the outside world.

She wondered if she could use her magic 
to make the outside world an even happier place.

Before she knew it, it was already morning. 
The sunshine lit up the outside world.

Determined to make everyone happy, 
the little witch set foot into the outside world.

A few days have passed since Mejiro McQueen won 
the Spring Tenno Sho twice in a row――
The training sessions of Team Sirius started to heat up.
Whoo! Another new personal best!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs

text_block_list.text:
Heat turns into energy, and the members 
continue to improve their times.
Everyone is in high spirits.
*huff huff*
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Doing a practice run, Mejiro McQueen once again 
shows a dignified performance.

Yep, McQueen's awesome as always! Not dropping 
her pace nor form the entire time!
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text:
Surely there's no other Umamusume that 
can beat McQueen at long distances!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs

text_block_list.text:
It's true, there probably aren't many Umamusume 
who could compete with her at long distances.
But... My gaze was drawn to one other Umamusume.
But... My gaze was drawn to one other Umamusume.
*huff huff*
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower. Unable to achieve the results she wanted, 
she recently joined the team.

Oof. Rice is looking pretty beat. 
She's entirely out of breath.
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text:
She's not wrong. Compared to Mejiro McQueen, 
Rice Shower's running is not there yet, but...

She's not wrong. Compared to Mejiro McQueen, 
Rice Shower's running is not there yet, but...

She's looking at Mejiro McQueen 
with a seriously sharp gaze.
She's holding on, no matter how tough it gets.
And above all...
*huff huff*
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Almost... there...
Just a little more...
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
You're still keeping up with me, huh? 
However...
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Ah!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: *pant pant*
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: *huff huff*
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
Goaaal!
Another new personal best!
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text: You're so awesome!
text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl

text_block_list.text:
I wouldn't expect less from the 'Tenno Sho' Umamusume,
our ace! Right, Trainer?
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs

text_block_list.text: C-Could you stop the flattery, please?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: And Rice, you did great too.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: *huff* Eh? I did?
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: You showed some real guts, pushing your limits like that!
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text:
But... If I'm really that good at running, 
why can't I win any races...?
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
I tried so hard for the Satsuki Sho, and the recent 
race too, but I only got eighth place...
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
You say that, but you managed to follow behind McQueen 
all the way until the last 50 meters. Don't sweat it!
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text: Uh... But...
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
She's got to start believing in herself more. 
A positive, "I can do it!" mentality.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
She's got to start believing in herself more. 
A positive, "I can do it!" mentality.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
There's also something I noticed when we were running 
together. Something that's lacking.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: I'm talking about 'distance'.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: D-Distance...?
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
She's right. Your body isn't very large, but very efficient. 
And with those legs...
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: You're totally suited to be a 'Stayer', Rice!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: You're totally suited to be a 'Stayer', Rice!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Me, a Stayer? 
McQueen is one, too...
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
Indeed. Your abilities will come to fruition 
during longer races. That race where you 
finished eighth just wasn't long enough.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
There's a 2400m race coming up soon. 
Although... The participants are highly skilled.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
There's a 2400m race coming up soon. 
Although... The participants are highly skilled.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
When I said that, the expression on everyone's faces 
changed, except for Rice Shower. She hasn't figured 
it out yet.

I want her to run not just any race... It's a very special 
race for Umamusume. A once-in-a-lifetime experience 
that decides who's at the very top...
The... The Nippon Derby?!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower's shriek raced across the training course, 
as if it knew how fast she'd need to run in the near future.
